radiographic_examinations.findings: Septal mid-wall late gadolinium enhancement compatible with septal perforation and chronic inferior wall subendocardial infarct.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Follow-up scan 8 weeks after PCI showed a small area of focal fibrosis at the site of previous intervention, less prominent than seen on the previous scan, likely representing infarct resorption and reduction in associated inflammatory changes.

radiographic_examinations.findings: No inducible ischemia on the stress perfusion scan images.
